attributes.additional_details: There is a real shortage of lgv drivers and it will create more jobs and the more lgv drivers there is the better the economy will recover from this pandemic
attributes.background: For the government/Parliament to consider funding for lgv licences

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same/a similar action: 

Provide grants to pay for the training of more HGV Drivers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593511
